GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.21 to before v5.15.73
GSD.description:
usb: mon: make mmapped memory read only

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.73 by commit 5ff80339cdc3143b89eee2ad91ae44b4dbf65ad1, it was introduced in version v2.6.21 by commit 6f23ee1fefdc1f80bd8a3ab04a1c41ab2dec14c9. For more details please see the references link.
